3) Uterine massage
Th is technique helps in contraction of the uterus and thus prevents PPH. 
/circle6 Immediately aft  er delivery of the placenta, massage the fundus of the uterus through 
the womanâ€™s abdomen until it is well contracted. Repeat the uterine massage every 15 
minutes for the fi rst two hours.
